name: Sorcerer
shortDescription: Innate spellcasters who wield magic drawn from bloodlines, curses, or raw arcane power.
description: Sorcerers are conduits of magic, born with supernatural power flowing through their veins. Their spellcasting is instinctive, flexible, and shaped by their origin.

spellcasting.description: Sorcerers know a limited number of spells and cast them using Charisma, shaping magic through instinct rather than study.

features.name: Sorcerous Origin
features.description: Choose a Sorcerous Origin that defines the source of your innate magic.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast sorcerer spells using Charisma.

features.name: Font of Magic
features.description: You gain sorcery points that can be converted into spell slots or fuel metamagic.

features.name: Metamagic
features.description: You gain the ability to twist spells to suit your needs.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Metamagic Option
features.description: You learn an additional Metamagic option.

features.name: Sorcerous Origin Feature
features.description: You gain a feature granted by your Sorcerous Origin.
